definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_tree_simple"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="type">oak</field><field name="base_height">5</field><field name="height_variation_a">5</field><field name="height_variation_b">3</field><field name="force_dirt">FALSE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><value name="dirt"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.DIRT#0</field></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:MusniusTreeTrunk</field></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:MusniusLeaves</field></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">8</field><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each tree horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_surface_water_depth"><field name="depth">2</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">These trees can generate in water, if it's at most 2 blocks deep</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block (which might be underwater)</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">We check that the tree doesn't generate in the wrong biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="placement_count" x="-403" y="972"><comment pinned="false" h="105" w="222">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. We try to place 2 trees in each chunk, and more rarely 3</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_weighted"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="weight0">9</field><field name="weight1">1</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how many times the tree is repeated in each chunk.</comment><value name="entry0"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">2</field></block></value><value name="entry1"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">3</field></block></value></block></value></block></xml>
